metadata.title: Yaba uses Sttok to manage incentive plans and its cap table
metadata.description: Yaba uses corporate management software for companies. Shareholder Register, Incentive Plans, Shareholder Meetings, etc.
metadata.keywords: Yaba, Sttok, Yaba and Sttok, Shareholder Register, incentive plans, Sttok clients

summary.title: Yaba manages Cap Table and Incentive Plans with Sttok

quote.text: 'Sttok was definitely our best option and is helping us with the management of Incentive Plans and with the transparency of corporate information with the Partners'
quote.author: AMALIA RIBOLDI
quote.position: HEAD OF PEOPLE & CULTURE at YABA

features.value: Cap Table, Incentive Plans, Document Generation, Automated Signing, etc

sections.title: A bit about Yaba
texts: Yaba stands for Your Amazing Brand Amplifier, a new generation brand house for personal wellness to live more and better. They manage online businesses and leverage online operations and marketing techniques.
Yaba is a high-growth company leading in its sector with a top-level professional team leading one of the benchmark projects in Europe.

sections.title: Why did they choose us?
texts: 1. For the ease of use of the platform.
2. For the automation of manual tasks.
3. For the management of the Shareholder Register (Cap Table).
4. For document generation and automated signing.
5. For the management of Incentive Plans.
